titleStmt.title: The voyce of him that is escaped from Babylon Reasons given forth to all sober minded people, why I departed from the ministry of those called ministers of parishes; and why I departed from the ministry of those called Anabaptists; and why I have, and what I have contended for, some years past.
titleStmt.author: West, Robert, b. ca. 1613.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
